name: GetAllFreshserviceRequesters
description:
Retrieve a list of all requesters in Freshservice.

Use this tool to get a comprehensive list of all requesters from the Freshservice platform, suitable for managing or reviewing requester information.

parameters.name: entries_per_page
parameters.description: Number of entries to retrieve in each page of the paginated list.

value_schema.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list.

parameters.name: page_number_to_retrieve
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve from the list of Freshservice requesters.

parameters.name: requester_email
parameters.description: The email address to find the corresponding requester.

value_schema.description: The email address for which the corresponding requester needs to be listed.

parameters.name: filter_by_mobile_phone_number
parameters.description: Filter requesters by their mobile phone number to return matching entries.

value_schema.description: The mobile phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: work_phone_number_for_requesters
parameters.description: The work phone number to filter requesters with that specific number in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: The work phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: query_filter
parameters.description: URL-encoded query filter to apply to the list of requesters. Supports first_name, last_name, job_title, primary_email, and more.

value_schema.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of requesters. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
first_name, last_name, job_title, primary_email, secondary_emails, work_phone_number, mobile_phone_number, department_id, reporting_manager_id, time_zone, language, location_id, created_at, updated_at, (all custom fields).
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/requesters?query="job_titile:'HR Manager' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

parameters.name: filter_active_accounts
parameters.description: Include only active user accounts if true. If false, include only deactivated accounts. Leaving unspecified returns both.

value_schema.description: Signifies if the user accounts to be listed are active (true), or have been deactivated. Not applying this filter returns both active and deactivated accounts.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list.

value_schema.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address for which the corresponding requester needs to be listed.

value_schema.description: The email address for which the corresponding requester needs to be listed.

parameters.name: mobile_phone_number
parameters.description: The mobile phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

value_schema.description: The mobile phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: work_phone_number
parameters.description: The work phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

value_schema.description: The work phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Signifies if the user accounts to be listed are active (true), or have been deactivated. Not applying this filter returns both active and deactivated accounts.

value_schema.description: Signifies if the user accounts to be listed are active (true), or have been deactivated. Not applying this filter returns both active and deactivated accounts.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of requesters. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
first_name, last_name, job_title, primary_email, secondary_emails, work_phone_number, mobile_phone_number, department_id, reporting_manager_id, time_zone, language, location_id, created_at, updated_at, (all custom fields).
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/requesters?query="job_titile:'HR Manager' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

value_schema.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of requesters. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
first_name, last_name, job_title, primary_email, secondary_emails, work_phone_number, mobile_phone_number, department_id, reporting_manager_id, time_zone, language, location_id, created_at, updated_at, (all custom fields).
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/requesters?query="job_titile:'HR Manager' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"
